messages.subject: Re: My Religion
messages.msgSnippet: ... I think you are right.  Romans 1:28-29 says:  Furthermore, since they did not think it worthwhile to retain the knowledge of God, he gave them over to a
messages.messageBody:
--- In Unschooling-dotcom@y..., Peggy <peggy@l...> wrote:
> Some people feel good doing bad. Isn't that what evil is all about?
> Peggy

I think you are right. Romans 1:28-29 says: Furthermore, since they
did not think it worthwhile to retain the knowledge of God, he gave
them over to a depraved mind, to do what ought not to be done. They
have become filled with every kind of wickedness, evil, greed and
depravity. I am sure I could find a similar description in the
Jewish scripture.

These verses are not only descriptive of evil, but prophetic,
like "Back to the Future II" in real life.

Mike

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] My Religion
messages.msgSnippet: ... Some people feel good doing bad. Isn t that what evil is all about? Peggy
messages.messageBody:
melly~ wrote:
>
> I saw a quote stitched this weekend:
>
> "When I do good I feel good.
> When I do bad I feel bad.
> That is my religion."
> - Abe Lincoln
>
> Methinks old Abe was a very wise man!
> : )
> melly~

Some people feel good doing bad. Isn't that what evil is all about?

Peggy

messages.subject: My Religion
messages.msgSnippet: I saw a quote stitched this weekend: When I do good I feel good. When I do bad I feel bad. That is my religion. - Abe Lincoln Methinks old Abe was a very
messages.messageBody:
I saw a quote stitched this weekend:

"When I do good I feel good.
When I do bad I feel bad.
That is my religion."
- Abe Lincoln

Methinks old Abe was a very wise man!
: )
melly~
